channel.title: [718/728] Matrix OPCODE FIXED source+cache+client bundle release
channel.description:
Hey guys, I recently spent a long while finding a working source+client+cache for Matrix 718. I fixed the opcode errors and got a cache that doesn't have invisible models. Most of the sources and caches I found didn't work so I thought I'd upload the whole source+client+cache as a bundle and share with you guys so you don't have to spend ages to find a working Matrix source. Enjoy peeps for those who haven't got it :) I also made a compiler since it didn't have one as a little extra :P
1. Go to Matrix 718 folder, open run.bat in there, that will run the server 2. Go to 718+ Client folder (which is inside Matrix 718 folder) and open run.bat here, that will run the client
The cache is already where it needs to be.
If you are experiencing issues getting it to work, feel free to leave a message here and I'll help to the best of my ability.
Content: [ul][li]Pots[/li] [li]Fight Kiln[/li] [li]Nomad[/li] [li]Fight caves[/li] [li]Crucible[/li] [li]Dominion tower[/li] [li]Most of player combat[/li] [li]Quick chat[/li] [li]Private messages[/li] [li]Public chat[/li] [li]Player and NPC Update[/li] [li]Price check[/li] [li]Musics System[/li] [li]Skills xp counter and xp dropping[/li] [li]Trade[/li] [li]Prayer including drain rates and effects and quick selecting[/li] [li]Equipping and equipments loaded rom ache[/li] [li]Auras[/li] [li]degrading[/li] [li]cutscenes system and most of cutscenes[/li] [li]dialogues system and most of dialogues[/li] [li]Friend and ignore list[/li] [li]Hint icons system[/li] [li]Emotes book[/li] [li]All agility courses that are coded[/li] [li]Start on construction[/li] [li]Start on dungeonnering[/li] [li]Fading screen[/li] [li]Fishing spots handling[/li] [li]Food[/li] [li]Living rock Caverns[/li] [li]Magic[/li] [li]Runecrafting[/li] [li]Shops[/li] [li]Skill Capes Customizing[/li] [li]Skill dialogues[/li] [li]Auras[/li] [li]Castle wars[/li] [li]Fight pits[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Corporeal Beast[/li] [li]King black dragon[/li] [li]Kalphite queen[/li] [li]All the tutorial Island that is done[/li] [li]Start tutorial[/li] [li]Wilderness[/li] [li]Godwars[/li] [li]Bonfire[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Thieving stalls[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Following[/li] [li]Resting[/li] [li]Summoning[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Interfaces manager[/li] [li]Tasks system[/li] [li]Dynamic regions system (used for instances etc)[/li] [li]Controllers system[/li] [li]Poison[/li] [li]Hits[/li] [li]Walk[/li] [li]Spawned objects[/li] [li]Dropped items[/li] [li]Projectiles clip[/li] [li]IPBanning[/li] [li]ItemBonuses[/li] [li]ItemExamine[/li] [li]DisplayNames[/li] [li]Update server[/li] [li]Integrated RSA[/li] [li]NPCBonuses[/li] [li]NPC Combat Definitions[/li] [li]Map Areas[/li] [li]Falador Giant Mole[/li] [li]Player Looks(Haircutter, skin changing,gender, and cloths changing)[/li] [li]The core structure[/li] [li]Encrypted maps ith own xteas[/li] [li]Music hints[/li] [li]Restarting[/li][/ul]
And much more Some pics: [img]http://i.imgur.com/PXHmAye.jpg[/img] Comp cape customizer: [img]http://i.imgur.com/SNoV2mi.jpg[/img] [size=36pt]431.2MB [url=http://up.ht/1hm73wc](1)[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/qrgmuigmz7kww44/Matrix+718.rar](2)[/url] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/0ron0ehy3ks2v52/MatrixPackage.rar](3)[/url]
If the download links stop working, just let me know and I'll upload it again (but probably on the last page because of time period edit restrictions) Credits: Matrix team [/size]

[quote=“opo2, post:47, topic:541663”]When I run the client I get this error “The system cannot find the path specified” how do I fix this, thx in advance :-).[/quote] If your encountering this problem edit the compiler and run.bats to your java version run both compilers before launching server hope i helped if u need more detailed assistance pm me

item.dc:creator: @short77guy short77guy
item.description:
@short77guy wrote:

I need help changing the Server/Source IP address. Some reason my Windows 7 Searching features have not been working very well. When i try and search for 127.0.0.1 or no-ip within the server source folder, nothing is showing up. I don’t know why. I have the client IP addresses all set the right way so I don’t need those directions. I tried searching online on what file it is located in, and I am having a hard time finding it because the majority of people are only giving tutorials on how to change the client’s IP address. Thanks for your help and time, really want to get this working because it looks like a great server!

Read full topic

! C:\Users\øgaren\Desktop\rebuilt.Matrix 718.rar: Checksum error in Matrix 718\718+ Client\bin\Class240.class. The file is corrupt
! C:\Users\øgaren\Desktop\rebuilt.Matrix 718.rar: Checksum error in Matrix 718\718+ Client\bin\Class365_Sub1_Sub3_Sub2.class. The file is corrupt
! C:\Users\øgaren\Desktop\rebuilt.Matrix 718.rar: Checksum error in Matrix 718\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat2. The file is corrupt

! C:\Users\øgaren\Desktop\rebuilt.Matrix 718.rar: Checksum error in Matrix 718\information\itemList.txt. The file is corrupt
! C:\Users\øgaren\Desktop\rebuilt.Matrix 718.rar: Checksum error in Matrix 718\src\com\rs\game\npc\nomad\FlameVortex.java. The file is corrupt

WinRAR does this all the time don’t matter which file i download. Do you know how to fix this? I would appreciate that alot.[/quote]
